medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 3 weeks ago with vague lower abdominal pain. Initially, he was in normal health until the onset of symptoms. Following a CT scan, he was initially diagnosed with gastroenteritis. Symptoms worsened leading to fever and chills to 103°F after a course of antibiotics. Over the last weekend, he started having high-grade fevers again and leukocytosis was noted.
medical_history.family_history: Grandmother with lymphoma and hypertension; aunt with colitis.
